content: I plan on adding HLA examples for DiagnosticReport, Genotype Observation, and Haplotype Observation to the IG. I haven't found a good way to validate them because of the issues I'm having with FHIR validator (eg https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/23-conformance/subject/validator.20and.20profiling.20with.20spreadsheets), so while I'm pretty sure they're okay, there may be issues with them. Let me know if you want me to wait on these, or go forward.
I say add them - there are numerous problems with other examples that we need to address at some point, and I will beat yours will be better.

Yes, validating our examples is hard/not possible atm. HAPI failed with the pattern (the java validator uses the same validation code), Grahames server had a bug during the connectathon, VONK doesn't support R4.
Grahame found the bug, maybe validating against his server works now?
